title: XDM Business Opportunity Person Relation
description: This class is used to capture XDM Business Opportunity Person Relationship attributes.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

opportunityPersonID.title: Opportunity Person ID
opportunityPersonID.description: Unique ID for the relationship between the opportunity and the person.

opportunityID.title: Opportunity ID
opportunityID.description: Unique ID for the opportunity in this opportunity person relationship.

personID.title: Person ID
personID.description: Unique ID for the person in this opportunity person relationship.

personRole.title: Person Role
personRole.description: Role of the person on this opportunity.

isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
isPrimary.description: Boolean indicating if the person is the primary contact on this opportunity.
